com.sinch.xms.api.MtBatchSmsResult

Packages that use MtBatchSmsResult 
Package Description
com.sinch.xms
This package contains a Java interface for the Sinch XMS API.
com.sinch.xms.api
A collection of classes that represent objects sent and received from the XMS REST API.
